metadata.title: CVE-2024-6923 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a MEDIUM severity vulnerability affecting CPython.Theemail module didnâ€™t properly quote newlines for email headers whenserializing an email message allowing for header injection when an email is serialized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-6923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python3.12 - 3.12.6-1
libpython3.12-minimal - 3.12.6-1
libpython3.12-stdlib - 3.12.6-1
libpython3.12-testsuite - 3.12.6-1
libpython3.12t64 - 3.12.6-1
python3.12 - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-examples - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-full - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-gdbm - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-minimal - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-nopie - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-tk - 3.12.6-1
python3.12-venv - 3.12.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python3.12 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.6-1').
